content:
After conducting a web search, I found several results for a low budget vegetarian 7 day meal plan including breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks that are diabetes-friendly. Here is a sample meal plan that includes recipe ideas from various sources:

Day 1:

* Breakfast: Avocado toast with a poached egg [[9](https://thesuperhealthyfood.com/breakfast-lunch-and-dinner-meal-plan-for-a-week/)]
* Snack: Carrots and hummus
* Lunch: Slow cooker creamy lentil soup with cannellini beans [[1](https://www.eatingwell.com/article/291342/7-day-clean-eating-vegetarian-meal-plan-to-lose-weight-1200-calories/)]
* Snack: Greek yogurt with berries
* Dinner: Vegetarian spaghetti squash lasagna [[8](https://www.eatingwell.com/article/126017/7-day-budget-meal-plan-shopping-list/)]

Day 2:

* Breakfast: Banana oatmeal pancakes [[3](https://www.cooksmarts.com/articles/free-budget-meal-plan/)]
* Snack: Apple slices with almond butter
* Lunch: Meal prep noodle soup jars [[6](https://www.budgetbytes.com/category/recipes/vegetarian/)]
* Snack: Roasted chickpeas
* Dinner: Chickpea stew [[4](https://www.thekitchn.com/our-10-best-vegetarian-meal-plans-23048927)]

Day 3:

* Breakfast: Customizable breakfast sandwich [[3](https://www.cooksmarts.com/articles/free-budget-meal-plan/)]
* Snack: Hard-boiled egg
* Lunch: Sweet potato, hummus, and peanut butter snack [[7](https://www.dietsmealplan.com/meal-plan/on-a-budget/vegetarian-meal-plan-on-budget/)]
* Snack: String cheese and grapes
* Dinner: Falafel-spiced tofu with roasted vegetables [[4](https://www.thekitchn.com/our-10-best-vegetarian-meal-plans-23048927)]

Day 4:

* Breakfast: Blueberry almond butter oatmeal [[7](https://www.dietsmealplan.com/meal-plan/on-a-budget/vegetarian-meal-plan-on-budget/)]
* Snack: Cottage cheese with sliced peaches
* Lunch: Leftover falafel-spiced tofu with roasted vegetables [[4](https://www.thekitchn.com/our-10-best-vegetarian-meal-plans-23048927)]
* Snack: Trail mix
* Dinner: Vegetarian green curry with brown rice [[4](https://www.thekitchn.com/our-10-best-vegetarian-meal-plans-23048927)]

Day 5:

* Breakfast: Overnight oats with chia seeds and berries [[3](https://www.cooksmarts.com/articles/free-budget-meal-plan/)]
* Snack: Edamame
* Lunch: Leftover vegetarian green curry with brown rice [[4](https://www.thekitchn.com/our-10-best-vegetarian-meal-plans-23048927)]
* Snack: Yogurt with mixed nuts
* Dinner: Spinach and feta stuffed portobello mushrooms [[10](https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/easy-healthy-meals)]

Day 6:

* Breakfast: Homemade granola with almond milk [[2](https://www.tasteofhome.com/collection/vegetarian-meal-plan/)]
* Snack: Cherry tomatoes with mozzarella cheese
* Lunch: Leftover slow cooker creamy lentil soup with cannellini beans [[1](<https://www.eatingwell.com/article/>
